alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Western Columbia (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 2:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia and northeastern Greene Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Baltimore, or 12 miles northwest of Hudson, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... New Baltimore, Coxsackie, Athens, Kinderhook, Stockport, Stuyvesant, Stuyvesant Falls, Columbiaville, Greenville Center, West Coxsackie, Rossman, Result, Earlton, Otter Hook, Sanfords Corners, Stockport Station, Limestreet, Climax, Hannacroix and Sunnyside. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 21 and 21B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
